sentences.sContent: It is advisable to write a career objective at the start of your resume.
sentences.sCn: 简历开头最好写上职业目标。

sentences.sContent: ...it is advisable to give them more flexibility as to where and how they work...
...it is advisable for us to have a more face to face communication with our families...
...it is more advisable to focus on the quality of goods than to decorate its appearance...

remMethod.val: advis(e) (建议， 劝告) ＋ able(能…的) → 能够听取别人的劝告是明智的 → 明智的

trans.tranOther: something that is advisable should be done in order to avoid problems or risks
